product_name: Columbia Silver Ridge Skort - Toddler Girls' - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Give adventurous toddlers the best of both worlds: the Columbia Silver Ridge(TM) skort combines a cute skirt with the easy practicality of shorts so she can play the day away in total comfort. Nylon skirt and interior polyester/rayon shorts feel soft next to skin, wick away moisture and dry quickly for all-day comfort. Integrated UPF 30 sun protection continuosly guards against harmful ultraviolet rays. Silver Ridge Skort features an interior adjustable waistband for customized fit. Closeout.
short_description: Give adventurous toddlers the best of both worlds: the Columbia Silver Ridge(TM) skort combines a cute skirt with the easy practicality of shorts so she can play the day away in total comfort.
